5a0ec01c-d2ca-42d5-ad41-f87c424209d8.name: Acidic Blood
5a0ec01c-d2ca-42d5-ad41-f87c424209d8.notes: You must be bleeding-- which requires you to have been injured by a cutting, impaling, or piercing attack-- to use this.

012abcb2-0448-437f-8da9-fd67b74f588b.name: Melee Attack, Reach C, Cannot Parry

228b534b-59ac-4e3c-93d8-b936944e1414.name: Bellow Lungs
228b534b-59ac-4e3c-93d8-b936944e1414.notes: Does sw+2d cr (based on your ST) doubled. For knockback purposes only.

b14fd27f-918c-41fe-b449-2e5559a8aca9.name: Electrified Skin
b14fd27f-918c-41fe-b449-2e5559a8aca9.notes: For 1FP per minute you electrify your skin. Turning on and off requires Ready. Anyone you touch or strike with a metal weapon-- or does the same to you-- automatically takes 1d burn and must roll HT+DR or be stunned

d9722799-7c3d-4724-8fe2-0b401f910afb.name: Mighty Roar
d9722799-7c3d-4724-8fe2-0b401f910afb.notes: Dodgable. 1FP and shout at anyone within 10 yards. Requires Successful DX-4 or Innate Attack (Breath Roll) with no range penalties. Target gets +5 for Protected Hearing.
